org.dyn4j.collision

Interface Collidable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Transformable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Body

    public interface Collidable
extends Transformable
    Represents an object that can collide with other objects.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.1.5
    Author:
    William Bittle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AABB createAABB()
      Creates an AABB from this Collidable.
      Fixture getFixture(int index)
      Returns the Fixture at the given index.
      int getFixtureCount()
      Returns the number of Fixtures attached to this Collidable object.
      java.util.List<? extends Fixture> getFixtures()
      Returns a new list containing the fixtures attached to this Collidable.
      java.util.UUID getId()
      Returns a unique identifier for this Collidable.
      Transform getTransform()
      Returns the Transform of the object.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.dyn4j.geometry.Transformable

        rotate, rotate, rotate, translate, translate

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.util.UUID getId()
        Returns a unique identifier for this Collidable.
        Returns:
        UUID the unique id
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • createAABB

        AABB createAABB()
        Creates an AABB from this Collidable.

        This method returns a degenerate AABB, (0.0, 0.0) to (0.0, 0.0), for Collidables that have no fixtures.

        Returns:
        AABB
        Since:
        3.0.0
